name: Requested
description: The area focus group is editing the letter

name: Considering
description: The letter is evaluated by office staff to decide its merit

name: Drafting Memo
description: The memo for signature collection is being drafted

name: LA Approval
description: The letter is evaluated by the LD

name: LD Approval
description: The letter is evaluated by the LD

name: Senator Approval
description: The senator gives final approval on the letter

name: Push To DPCC Feed
description: The senator gives final approval on the letter

name: Email DPCC
description: The senator gives final approval on the letter

name: Review Signon Lists
description: After collecting cosigners, the list of cosigners is reviewed

name: Collect signatures
description: The letter is printed out physically and signatures are obtained

name: Submit To Subcommittee
description: The letter is sent to subcommittee
